name: places/ChIJUS5Wz-xYwokRhBzR-8ZFmGE
adrFormatAddress: 901 5th Ave, New York, NY 10021-4157, USA

originalText.text: Our young daughter was in a recent ASD clinical trial.  We had 6 visits and numerous correspondence, all were professional and thoughtful.  Met with Doctor Vats, Doctor Rahman, Mr. Chu, a visiting Italian Doctor, and a Psychologist.  We were happy with the results and care.

text.text: Our young daughter was in a recent ASD clinical trial.  We had 6 visits and numerous correspondence, all were professional and thoughtful.  Met with Doctor Vats, Doctor Rahman, Mr. Chu, a visiting Italian Doctor, and a Psychologist.  We were happy with the results and care.

originalText.text: We paid a huge out of pocket sum ($750!) in order to have our teenager see Dr. Daly. He responded to 1of 2 emails, only giving us a short, impersonal answer to 1 basic question and leaving the rest of the questions and concerns unanswered.  We had to wait till the follow up a month later, where we again shared concerns about the med and it’s interaction with current medications,  and asked if there were other options. He offered no other discussion. Follow up appt was $400. Eighteen minutes with me, 6 min with the teenager.  He basically told them, call me if you decide to take this medicine, otherwise let’s not waste your time and money. Abruptly ended the call. Uninterested in collaborating with the patient, more authoritative. Waste of money and really disappointing. Turns out, our much  less experienced, insurance- accepting psychiatrist is a far better option. If you think you’re paying for top tier service, reconsider.

originalText.text: Practice only cares about money and you are not paying for top tier psychiatrists.  Egotistical and want to charge to answer questions they really don't have an answer for. Like previous review from other client you are not paying for top notch service.
